title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in the dynamic text item differs from the format displayed in the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a text, data, or dynamic text item in the application.
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and bind them to both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
3. Compare the format in which the datetime values are displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
